SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,orgFileName,saveFileName, fileSize,regdate FROM shop_review
WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%${writer}%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND ${endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM shop_review
WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%${writer}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_review (num, writer, title, content, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(shop_review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content} #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
